eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm

Interface FileAccess

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FTPConnection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalConnection

    public interface FileAccess
    The functions to access files relative to a base directory.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.10.06.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<FileInfo> list()
      List the contents of a remote directory.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieve

        byte[] retrieve(java.lang.String file)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Retrieve the contents of a file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        Returns:
        the byte array of the file contents
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error

      • send

        void send(java.lang.String file,
        byte[] data)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Send a new file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file name
        data - the file contents
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs

      • list

        java.util.List<FileInfo> list()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        List the contents of a remote directory.
        Returns:
        the list of files and directories.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs

      • rename

        void rename(java.lang.String file,
          java.lang.String newName)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Try renaming a file.
        Parameters:
        file - the current name
        newName - the new name
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the rename fails
